title: Grilled goats’ cheese and courgette with spring salad
description: Succellent courgette with creamy goats' cheese, served up with fresh salad bursting with summer veg
ingredients: 2 large round courgettes, cut into 1cm/½in thick slices
salt and freshly ground black pepper
400g/14oz goats’ cheese, cut into 1cm/½in thick slices
1 banana shallot, very finely sliced into rings
